snippet: The entire secret military file that was used to wrongly convict Capt. Alfred Dreyfus of spying for Germany in 1894 has been posted by the French Ministry of Defense.
abstract: Historical department of French Ministry of Defense posts online entire secret military file that was used to wrongly convict Capt Alfred Dreyfus of spying for Germany in 1894; infamous case, which involved strong themes of anti-Semitism and patriotism, consumed and divided France for more than a decade.
lead_paragraph: The entire secret military file that was used to wrongly convict Capt. Alfred Dreyfus of spying for Germany in 1894 has been posted by the French Ministry of Defense.

headline.main: French Ministry Posts Online Full File on ‘Dreyfus Affair’
headline.print_headline: French Ministry Posts Online Full File on ‘Dreyfus Affair’
